about_the_game:
It's a sad day for us all as we look back on the year 2222 A.D. and see what has become of our beloved Earth.
We're on a great big adventure, looking for a new planet to call home.

I'm so excited to tell you about this amazing journey you're about to embark on! You're going to be traveling in a spaceship.
The spaceship is growing and changing, and it needs a special kind of fuel to keep going. This fuel is in the form of a ring called a "wakka."

As you journey through the cosmos, keep your eyes on the prize: a new star to collect some "wakka" along the way!

Rules

The controls are really simple, so don't worry!
To raise the spaceship, just press the button. When you release it, gravity will pull the spaceship down. Collect "wakka" while avoiding walls and obstacles.

There are two game modes: "Stage Mode" and "Endless Mode."
You can use the wakka you've collected in the in-game SHOP. You can customize the game by purchasing wall colors, spaceship types, and backgrounds at the SHOP.

Experience the simple, yet irresistible world of "WAKKA"!

About Live Video Distribution


Distribution of gameplay videos, whether by individuals or corporations, is acceptable as long as it adheres to our guidelines.
Live game play/distribution of content that contains slander or is offensive to public order and morals is prohibited.
D.O. Inc. assumes no responsibility for any damages or problems that may occur through live game play/distribution.

■Guidelines for derivative works

highlighted.name: I can't...I can't move,I don't want to move.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700KF
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
